name: Tria Somnia
description:
Tria Somnia is a short game about fighting monsters in a dream world, in a semi-turn-based battle system.

Made for Lowrezjam 2020.

Controls:

  • left, down and right key to attack
  • to parry, attack when the monster's bar is yellow
  • space to pause the game

(alternatively use a, s, d, or gamepad direction pad, or gamepad x, a, b)

Credits:

  • Game design, programming, graphics: sprvrn
  • Music, writing, title screen: Nyeti
  • Font and color palette from lexaloffle's pico8

Made with löve2d and FamiTracker.
